articles.author: Amelia Lucas
articles.title: PepsiCo earnings top estimates, but quarterly revenue slides - CNBC
articles.description: PepsiCo's revenue fell 0.5% in the fourth quarter, as it saw slower demand in North America.
articles.content:
PepsiCo on Friday reported mixed quarterly results as North American demand for its food and drinks weakened.
Shares of the company fell more than 2% in premarket trading.
